subject: NCAA Ice Hockey Championships
Hockey, Ice
lead_paragraph: Parker Milner stopped 33 shots for his second straight shutout, and top-seeded Boston College advanced to its 10th Frozen Four in 15 years with a 4-0 win over Minnesota-Duluth.
snippet: Parker Milner stopped 33 shots for his second straight shutout, and top-seeded Boston College advanced to its 10th Frozen Four in 15 years with a 4-0 win over Minnesota-Duluth.
